directions: Blend pineapple, ice, orange juice, sugar, and a pinch of salt in a blender until smooth. Add milk and blend until frothy. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/4 pineapple (labeled "extra sweet"), peeled, cored, and cut into chunks (1 cup)
Garnish: pineapple wedges and orange slices
title: Pineapple Orange Batidos
